verses.verse: A <S%H7892>Song<s%> of <S%H4609>degrees<s%> of <S%H1732>David.<s%> <S%H3884>If<s%> it had not <S%H1961>been<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> who was on our side, <S%H4994>now<s%> may <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H559>say;<s%>
<S%H3884>If<s%> it had not <S%H1961>been<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> who was on our side, when <S%H120>men<s%> <S%H6965>rose<s%> up <S%H5921>against<s%> us:
<S%H233>Then<s%> they had <S%H1104>swallowed<s%> us up <S%H2416>quick,<s%> when their <S%H639>wrath<s%> was <S%H2734>kindled<s%> against us:
<S%H233>Then<s%> the <S%H4325>waters<s%> had <S%H7857>overwhelmed<s%> us, the <S%H5158>stream<s%> had <S%H5674>gone<s%> <S%H5674>over<s%> our <S%H5315>soul:<s%>
<S%H1288>Blessed<s%> be the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> who has not <S%H5414>given<s%> us as a <S%H2964>prey<s%> to their <S%H8127>teeth.<s%>

Our <S%H5315>soul<s%> is <S%H4422>escaped<s%> as a <S%H6833>bird<s%> out of the <S%H6341>snare<s%> of the <S%H3369>fowlers:<s%> the <S%H6341>snare<s%> is <S%H7665>broken,<s%> and we are <S%H4422>escaped.<s%>
Our <S%H5828>help<s%> is in the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> who <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H8064>heaven<s%> and <S%H776>earth.<s%>
